attributes.action: reduce road tax for LPG powered vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LPG is recognised as the cleanest most enviromentally friendly fuel and yet we still pay full road tax for our cars.I had a 4.0litre jeep running on LPG and yet paid same tax as someone with a petrol or diesel equivalent because of engine size!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
